titleStmt.title: The bloody dovvnfall of adultery. murder, ambition at the end of which are added Westons, and Mistris Turners last teares, shed for the murder of Sir Thomas Ouerbury poysoned in the Tower; who for the fact, suffered deserued execution at Tiburne the 14. of Nouember last. 1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By George Eld] for R. H[iggenbotham] and are to be sold at his shop at the Cardinalls Hat without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names and publication date from STC.
The words "adultery .. ambition," are enclosed in brackets on the title page.
Identified as STC 18921 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the Cardinalls Hat without Newgate
